originalText.text: the best liquor store I've ever been to; not really a shop but a boutique for collectors, enthusiasts or for anyone who wants to get in touch with a fascinating world; all superbly presented by Stefano and his staff

text.text: the best liquor store I've ever been to; not really a shop but a boutique for collectors, enthusiasts or for anyone who wants to get in touch with a fascinating world; all superbly presented by Stefano and his staff

originalText.text:
As we raise a toast to a year of excellence, it's only fitting to shine a spotlight on New York's most exclusive wine and whisky spirits store, a haven for enthusiasts seeking unparalleled service and an extraordinary selection. Collezione, Nestled in the heart of the city, this emporium stands as a testament to curated sophistication and a commitment to delivering an exceptional experience, curated by the patron, Stefano Pileggi in person.

From the moment you step through the door, the level of service at this distinguished establishment is nothing short of impeccable. The staff, a connoisseur's dream team, is not only knowledgeable but possesses a genuine passion for the craft. They seamlessly blend expertise with warmth, ensuring that every visitor feels welcomed and valued.

Navigating through the vast array of wines and whiskies can be a daunting task for even the most seasoned aficionado. Fear not, as the attentive staff is there to guide you with a level of insight that transforms the shopping experience into a personalized journey. Whether you're a novice seeking recommendations or a seasoned collector in pursuit of rare gems, the service here transcends expectations.

What truly sets this spirits emporium apart is its meticulously curated selection. Each bottle tells a story, carefully chosen to represent the pinnacle of craftsmanship and flavor. The shelves boast an impressive array of rare and exclusive finds, with a discerning eye for both established classics and emerging gems.

Whether you're in search of a rare Bordeaux from a legendary vineyard or a limited edition single malt scotch, Collezione, is a treasure trove of liquid masterpieces. The curation extends beyond the bottles themselves, encompassing accessories, glassware, and even expertly crafted tasting events that elevate the overall experience.

In a city known for its diversity, Collezione, mirrors that richness in its selection. The shelves celebrate the global tapestry of winemaking and distillation, showcasing not only iconic labels but also hidden gems from lesser-known regions. This commitment to diversity ensures that every palate finds its perfect match within these walls.

As we raise a glass to the first anniversary of this extraordinary establishment, it's clear that it has become more than a store—Collezione it's a destination for those who appreciate the finer things in life. The service, marked by genuine passion and knowledge, coupled with a selection that borders on the sublime, makes this spirits emporium a crown jewel in New York's vibrant landscape. Here's to another year of indulging in the artistry of wines and whiskies at this unparalleled haven of sophistication.
Cheers to Collezione~

originalText.text: Great experience! One of the finest whiskey shops I have ever seen with the highest level of expertise. The staff is also highly trained and provided outstanding advice on the subject!

text.text: Great experience! One of the finest whiskey shops I have ever seen with the highest level of expertise. The staff is also highly trained and provided outstanding advice on the subject!

originalText.text: Great selection of fine wines and whiskeys. The staff is also very knowledgeable. If you are looking for something special, this is the place.

text.text: Great selection of fine wines and whiskeys. The staff is also very knowledgeable. If you are looking for something special, this is the place.

originalText.text: Wonderful boutique liquor and wine store with a very sexy salesman! Believe his name started with a “G”…
